title: Can I just say

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
New spell shield colour. On point!

Thanks for listening to the feedback guys.
Keep it up.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: wait, they changed it again, wow, i prefered the first colour tbh
I liked it better when it was pink.
I'm kinda on the fence, but I play in colourblind mode and I like the colour it is there.

The pink colour was so hard to see on colourblind mode.
That must have been hard?

Mmm honestly not really, though colourblind mode is a preference not a need so I can't speak to what it was like for people who actually were. This was really only playing Galio though, and his shield is more a there or not rather than something like Morg's where you really want an idea of how big it is.

I didn't like the colour, and certainly I felt it could have been better visibility wise but it didn't feel like it was a massive problem. Given it was an easy fix though, glad they just got it out of the way.

It does make the shield more visible. It constrasts with the green so you can see it. I never realised just how big the maw shield was until it started popping up purple on a riven. Good change. 

Also that's a dope ass skin.

And it looks like a more 'magic' colour than light pink haha.

Yea its does seem bigger now that its easier to see :P

Yea that skin is one of his best, which is weird seeming it's by far his cheapest one xD

Damn straight. I thought it was rivens shield and was freaking out that she was getting such a large shield. 

Sick if I pick up Gallo I'll be sure to buy it

Hahaha I freak out anyway when Riven does anything xD

You should pick him up, he's pretty fun.
Im an old Gallo veteran tho, so I do kinda miss old Gallo. xD
_(especially his voice, the new one sounds like he is going to take my wallet and keys. xD.)_
